snippet: SolarCity, a prominent solar power energy company, has delayed its initial public offering by at least a day as it struggles to price its stock sale, a person briefed on the matter said.
abstract: SolarCity, a prominent solar power energy company, has delayed its initial public offering by at least a day as it struggles to price its stock sale, a person briefed on the matter said.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and DIANE CARDWELL

headline.main: SolarCity Is Said to Delay Its I.P.O.
